1. 将包文件复制到新机器

复制 mcp_feedback_enhanced-2.6.0-py3-none-any.whl



2. 安装

pip install mcp_feedback_enhanced-2.6.0-py3-none-any.whl --force-reinstall



3.修改mcp配置

{

 "mcpServers": {

  "mcp-feedback-enhanced": {

   "command": "mcp-feedback-enhanced",

   "args": []

  }

 }

}
